title: Vignette next to "The Effect of Color" ("Wirkung der Farbe") (headpiece, page 37) from Über das Geistige in der Kunst (Concerning the Spiritual in Art)
medium: Woodcut from an illustrated book with eleven woodcuts
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 1 5/8 x 4 7/8" (4.1 x 12.4 cm); page: 8 1/4 x 7 1/16" (21 x 18 cm)
